original_text: When the cavalry arrived in Caesarea, they delivered the letter to the governor and handed Paul over to him.
korean_text: 그들이 가이사랴에 들어가서 편지를 총독에게 드리고 바울을 그 앞에 세우니

sentences.original_text: When the cavalry arrived in Caesarea,
they delivered the letter to the governor
and handed Paul over to him.
